author: bluelion3
title: Great little vehicle for your Duplo people
review:
The main focus of this little set is the four-wheel farm bike.  Its wheels move up and down so you can drive over rough terrain.  The driver can sit or stand.  When standing, his arms can grip the handles. 

There is a crate and brick with a strawberry print that can be loaded on the back of the bike.  The set includes a friendly farmer, a shovel and flowers he can tend.  And there is a brick (one plain brick) so you don't forget it's a building set. 

The price is pretty reasonable and the vehicle is a nice addition to your child's Duplo collection.  (I assume this is for a child... Are there any Adult Fans of Duplo out there?)
